price: Hud disse: "Ó meu povo! Não há descaminho em mim, mas sou Mensageiro do Senhor dos mundos."
arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ لَيۡسَ بِي سَفَاهَةٞ وَلَٰكِنِّي رَسُولٞ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāqawmi laysa bī safāhatun walākinnī rasūlun min rabbi al-ʿālamīna
